class RestParser.SampleCentring¶
centre(data)¶
getCentring(data)¶
getStatus(*args)¶
move(data)¶

Move the selected motor to the desired position (check ‘data’ dict). Be careful:

  • MicrodiffMotor AND MicrodiffLight: ‘move’ method
  • MicrodiffZoom: ‘moveToPosition’ method
  • InOut: wagoIn/wagoOut (for the backligh activation)
